wexpman.persistencelayer

Interface ExperimentDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExperimentDAODb4oImpl

    public interface ExperimentDAO
    Interface which defines methods to be implemented by classes that provide access to stored experiment information
    Author:
    Matias Alberto Gavinowich

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteExperiment(Experiment experiment)
      Deletes the given experiment from storage
      boolean existsExperiment(String name)
      Asks if there is an experiment by the given name already stored
      Experiment findExperiment(String name)
      Find a specific experiment uniquely identified by the given name
      List<Experiment> getAllExperiments()
      Gets all the experiments in storage
      List<Experiment> matchExperiments(String type, String name, String description, String author, Date startDate, Date endDate)
      Matches experiments of the given type, that resemble the specified characteristics
      Experiment saveExperiment(Experiment experiment)
      Saves the given experiment into permanent storage
      Experiment saveExperimentChanges(Experiment experiment)
      Updates permanent storage with the given experiment
      List<Experiment> searchExperiments(String type)
      Retrieves all the experiments that correspond to the given type

    • Method Detail

      • saveExperiment

        Experiment saveExperiment(Experiment experiment)
        Saves the given experiment into permanent storage
        Parameters:
        experiment - the Experiment to save
        Returns:
        the saved Experiment which the caller should continue to work on since it may contain updated storage information

      • saveExperimentChanges

        Experiment saveExperimentChanges(Experiment experiment)
        Updates permanent storage with the given experiment
        Parameters:
        experiment - the Experiment to update
        Returns:
        the saved Experiment which the caller should continue to work on since it may contain updated storage information
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.OptimisticLockingFailureException - if a new version of the object has been committed since the given experiment was retrieved from the DB

      • findExperiment

        Experiment findExperiment(String name)
        Find a specific experiment uniquely identified by the given name
        Parameters:
        name - the String name of the requested experiment
        Returns:
        the Experiment requested, or null if it could not be found

      • existsExperiment

        boolean existsExperiment(String name)
        Asks if there is an experiment by the given name already stored
        Parameters:
        name - the String name of the experiment
        Returns:
        true if there is an experiment by the given name in storage, false otherwise

      • searchExperiments

        List<Experiment> searchExperiments(String type)
        Retrieves all the experiments that correspond to the given type
        Parameters:
        type - the String type of the requested experiments
        Returns:
        the experiments requested, as an unmodifiable list

      • deleteExperiment

        void deleteExperiment(Experiment experiment)
        Deletes the given experiment from storage
        Parameters:
        experiment - the Experiment to delete

      • matchExperiments

        List<Experiment> matchExperiments(String type,
                                String name,
                                String description,
                                String author,
                                Date startDate,
                                Date endDate)
        Matches experiments of the given type, that resemble the specified characteristics
        Parameters:
        type - the String type of the experiment
        name - the String name of the experiment, to be used in a loose comparison, null or empty if this criteria should not be applied
        description - the String description of the experiment, to be used in a loose comparison, null or empty if this criteria should not be applied
        author - the String author of the experiment, to be used in a loose comparison, null or empty if this criteria should not be applied
        startDate - the start Date for the experiment, inclusive, null if this criteria should not be applied
        endDate - the start Date for the experiment, inclusive, null if this criteria should not be applied
        Returns:
        the experiments that matched, as an unmodifiable list

      • getAllExperiments

        List<Experiment> getAllExperiments()
        Gets all the experiments in storage
        Returns:
        all the experiments, as an unmodifiable list
